== Installing Ubuntu Advocacy Kit (UAK) ==

So you want to install the Ubuntu Advocacy Kit ? It's very simple.

=== Requirements ===

* Ubuntu Advocacy works from Ubuntu 12.04 onwards.

=== Installing the latest version from the uak PPA ===

All users are recommended to install from the `uak` PPA; this contains the most current and stable release of Ubuntu Advocacy Kit.

To install, simply run following commands in terminal:

<pre>
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:uak-admins/uak
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install uak-en
</pre>

The Ubuntu Advocacy Kit should be now installed on your system.

To begin, run the '''Ubuntu Advocacy Kit''' app which is now available in the Dash (or run `uak` from a terminal).

* '''Have a question?''' - go and ask it <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/questions/ask?tags=uak|here]]</nowiki>.
* '''Found a bug?''' - go and report it <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/uak/+filebug|here]]</nowiki>.

=== Uninstalling ===

You can uninstall using the following commands:

<pre>
sudo apt-get remove uak-en
</pre>
